attributes.action: Alan Shearer to be given a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alan Shearer has done so much for the world of football and also has done so much for charity that we belive that he deserves to become sir alan shearer, he has never disgraced the sport he loves so much or the city he loves and he deserves this to be reconised

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
